description: Returns information about domain and nodes, including data nodes, master nodes, ultrawarm nodes, Availability Zone(s), standby nodes, node configurations, and node states.

nested_items.name: DomainNodesStatusList
nested_items.description: Contains nodes information list DomainNodesStatusList with details about the all nodes on the requested domain.

nested_items.name: NodeType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the nodes is a data, master, or UltraWarm node.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone of the node.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type information of the node.

nested_items.name: NodeStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates if the node is active or in standby.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: Indicates if the node has EBS or instance storage.

nested_items.name: StorageVolumeType
nested_items.description: If the nodes has EBS storage, indicates if the volume type is gp2 or gp3. Only applicable for data nodes.

nested_items.name: StorageSize
nested_items.description: The storage size of the node, in GiB.
